statements: SELECT * FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_type = 'banner';
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad_placements ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, click_count FROM ad_placements WHERE click_count > 100 ORDER BY click_count ASC;
SELECT ad_type, SUM(click_count) AS total_clicks FROM ad_placements GROUP BY ad_type;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM ad_placements;
SELECT * FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' ORDER BY ad_cost DESC, click_count ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost, conversion_rate FROM ad_placements WHERE click_count > 100 AND conversion_count > 5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_cost * conversion_rate AS total_cost FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_type = 'Video' AND conversion_rate > 0.05
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, (click_count * conversion_count) AS conversion_score FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_cost > 500 ORDER BY conversion_score DESC
SELECT ad_id, ad_type, conversion_rate FROM ad_placements WHERE ad_cost BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY ad_id
SELECT * FROM conversion_data ORDER BY conversion_date DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_placement_location FROM ad_placement WHERE ad_impressions > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_conversions FROM ad_placement WHERE ad_clicks > 500 AND ad_conversions > 50;
SELECT MAX(ad_impressions) AS max_impressions, MIN(ad_impressions) AS min_impressions FROM ad_placement;
SELECT ad_name, SUM(ad_clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_placement GROUP BY ad_name;
SELECT * FROM conversion_data ORDER BY conversion_date DESC, conversion_amount ASC
SELECT ad_name, ad_impressions, ad_clicks FROM ad_placement WHERE ad_clicks > 100 ORDER BY ad_impressions DESC
SELECT ad_name, ad_placement_location, ad_clicks FROM ad_placement WHERE ad_impressions > 500 AND ad_conversions > 10 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC
SELECT ad_name, ad_placement_location, ad_clicks FROM ad_placement WHERE ad_clicks > 50 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_clicks, ad_conversions FROM ad_placement WHERE ad_clicks > 200 ORDER BY ad_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, industry FROM Advertisers ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_budget FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Paid';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_budget FROM Ads WHERE ad_budget > 1000 ORDER BY ad_budget DESC;
SELECT c.conversion_id, c.conversion_date, c.conversion_value, a.ad_name FROM Conversions c INNER JOIN Ads a ON c.ad_id = a.ad_id ORDER BY c.conversion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT ad_name, ad_budget FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Banner';
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT ad_name, conversion_date FROM Ads INNER JOIN Conversions ON Ads.ad_id = Conversions.ad_id WHERE conversion_value > 1000;
SELECT industry, COUNT(advertiser_id) AS total_advertisers FROM Advertisers GROUP BY industry HAVING COUNT(advertiser_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_id, user_id, impression_date FROM ad_impressions ORDER BY impression_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, revenue FROM conversions WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, user_id, impression_date, cost FROM ad_impressions ORDER BY impression_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_date FROM ad_clicks WHERE click_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT ad_id, user_id, conversion_date, revenue FROM conversions WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, timestamp, user_id FROM ad_impressions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT ad_id, user_id, conversion_date FROM ad_conversions ORDER BY conversion_date ASC;
SELECT id, impressions, clicks FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_impressions FROM ad_impressions GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_impressions DESC;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 1000 AND total_conversions > 100;
SELECT ad_users.username, ad_campaigns.campaign_name FROM ad_users INNER JOIN ad_campaigns ON ad_users.id = ad_campaigns.id WHERE ad_users.email LIKE '%gmail.com';
